job.title: Software Engineer, TikTok Frontend
job.description: pTikTok is the leading destination for shortform mobile video Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles New York London Paris Berlin Dubai Mumbai Singapore Jakarta Seoul and TokyoppbrppTikToks Frontend team is responsible for bringing joy to users using web technology and making positive impacts The main goals of the team are to drive TikToks core user experience user growth frontend infratooling as well as complete cross functional operations Our team works on different products includingpp Using hybrid solutions to deliver key product features in the mobile app so that users can get updates without any app version updatespp Building wwwtiktokcom You will be working on pages directly seen by millions of users on a daily basis We focus on core web vitals to improve user experience as well improve information architecture to benefit SEOpp Bringing TikTok experience to the Living Room using web technology We launched TikTok for Samsung TV in 2020 and will continue advancement in product and technologypp Creating and managing various internal web applications which are critical to TikToks growth and ecosystemppbrppAs a member of TikToks Frontend team you willpp1 Work closely with product manager and designer to deliver state of the art user experience in the above products mentionedpp2 Build worldclass frontends which combine usability accessibility elegance performance and maintainabilitypp3 Adopt automated and manual test strategies to ensure product qualitypp4 Learn and understand how TikTok product works and help build endtoend solutionspp5 Learn and grow from working with great colleagues and taking on challengespp6 Help our team grow from your expertise experience and perspectivesppbrppstrongspan classqlcursorspanQualificationsstrongpp1 BABS Degree in Computer Science or related major 2 years of industry experience in a software development environmentpp2 Proficiency in Javascript ES56 CSS and various layoutspp3 Experience in solving CSSJS multibrowser compatibility problems and frontend performance optimizationpp4 Understanding of construction and continuous integration familiarity with at least one construction toolpp5 Understanding of componentbased development ideas familiarity with React Angular Vuejs or any other equivalent library  frameworkpp6 Understanding of backend technologies and databases is a plusppbrppTikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills experiences and unique perspectives Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace At TikTok our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy To achieve that goal we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach We believe individuals shouldnt be disadvantaged because of their background or identity but instead should be considered based on their strengths and experience We are passionate about this and hope you are tooppbrppTikTok is committed to providing reasonable accommodations during our recruitment process If you need assistance or an accommodation please reach out to us at USRCtiktokcomp
